pkgmetadata.longdescription: Basic Unit Level Model using Hierarchical Bayesian Approach // Small area estimation unit level models (Battese-Harter-Fuller model) with a Bayesian Hierarchical approach. See also Rao Molina (2015, ISBN:978-1-118-73578-7) and Battese et al. (1988) doi:10.1080/01621459.1988.10478561.
